TraitDef.label: Ash Vampire
TraitDef.description: Elite corpus warriors transformed into immortal champions of House Dagoth. These formidable beings possess supernatural strength, resilience, and combat prowess, but are bound eternally to serve the will of Dagoth Ur.

li.label: Lesser Ash Vampire
li.description: A newly transformed ash vampire, still adapting to their corpus-enhanced form. Possesses increased combat abilities and corpus resistance.

li.label: Ash Vampire
li.description: A fully realized ash vampire with formidable combat prowess and corpus mastery. Commands respect and fear from lesser beings.

li.label: Greater Ash Vampire
li.description: An ancient and powerful ash vampire, a living legend of House Dagoth. Possesses near-divine combat abilities and corpus mastery that borders on the supernatural.

TraitDef.label: Corpus Stalker
TraitDef.description: Corpus-twisted scouts and infiltrators who serve as the eyes and claws of House Dagoth. Their transformed bodies grant enhanced mobility and stealth capabilities, though they struggle with social interaction due to their disturbing appearance.

li.label: Corpus Scout
li.description: A corpus-touched scout whose body has begun to adapt for stealth and survival. Enhanced mobility and perception, but increasingly alienated from normal society.

li.label: Corpus Stalker
li.description: A fully transformed corpus stalker, adapted for hunting and reconnaissance. Possesses supernatural tracking abilities and combat reflexes.

TraitDef.label: Corpus Touched
TraitDef.description: Marked by the divine disease of House Dagoth, these individuals show early signs of corpus transformation. They gain resistance to disease and toxins but suffer from social stigma and gradual physical changes.

li.label: Corpus Touched
li.description: Recently infected with the corpus disease, showing early signs of transformation. Gains some resistance benefits but faces social challenges.

TraitDef.label: Sleeper
TraitDef.description: Corpus-touched seers and prophets under Dagoth Ur's spell who commune with divine dreams and visions. These unfortunate souls undergo progressive transformation from dream-touched seers to mighty ascended beings, gaining power and psychic abilities at the cost of their humanity.

li.label: Dream-Touched Sleeper
li.description: A newly awakened sleeper under Dagoth Ur's spell, beginning to experience divine visions. Shows enhanced psychic sensitivity and learning abilities but struggles with disturbing dreams and reality distortion.

li.label: Dream Prophet
li.description: An experienced sleeper whose visions guide House Dagoth's path and whose flesh begins corpus transformation. Possesses powerful psychic abilities and enhanced learning while gaining physical resilience.

li.label: Master Dream-Walker
li.description: A transcendent sleeper whose dreams shape reality while their corpus transformation accelerates. Commands extraordinary psychic powers and wisdom, though reality becomes increasingly fluid as their body transforms.

li.label: Corpus Seer
li.description: A grotesque fusion of flesh and corpus that retains extraordinary psychic vision. These beings maintain intelligence and prophetic abilities while gaining fearsome combat capabilities through their transformed bodies.

li.label: Ascended Sleeper
li.description: The final and most terrible form of sleeper transformation. These beings have transcended mortality through corpus while retaining their visionary powers, becoming living weapons of divine will with immense power, prophetic sight, and complete devotion to Dagoth Ur.
